text: What a treat this video is to make.
This video has all of your videos telling me your favorite book.
A couple of weeks ago, I made a video asking you to make me a video practicing your English.
I think these challenges are a great way for people to work on their skills
and also to get to know people from across the world.
I put out the call and you guys answered.
The topic was your favorite book and I love watching your videos!
These videos are really my favorite kinds of videos to make.
It is so exciting for me to get to know you, to get to see you,
and now I have a ton of great book recommendations.
If you watched this video and you think “Man, I want to make a video for a challenge!”
Then please sign up for my mailing list.
I send out videos and podcasts every week to my mailing list totally free
and then you'll also be sure that you hear about the next challenge
which will be at the end of the year.
I always want to do a highlight of my year video.
Those are fun so look for that in November or December.
But now, without—Wait, did I say how to sign up for my mailing list?
I don't think I did.
Go to rachelsenglish.com/newsletter
That is how to get on the mailing list and it's totally free.
Now without further ado, your videos!
Your favorite book!
